original_text: Keep it always in front of you. Think about my message all the time, as if you have written it on your heart.
korean_text: 이것을 네 손가락에 매며 이것을 네 마음판에 새기라

sentences.original_text: Keep it always in front of you.
Think about my message all the time,
as if you have written it on your heart.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 네가 너의 마음에 그것을 쓴 것처럼.
